text:
Hi, 

I saw on the source of this tag and I note that use the StringUtils.chomp 
function of the common apache libs

The problem is that function change and there is other function to do the same 
functionality.

Is the function "StringUtils.substringBeforeLast(String, String)"

How shoud I change that or who could change the taglib?

Thanks

example:
<str:chomp delimiter="_">en_US</str:chomp>  --------> return es_US and must be 
en
creator: lionel.pieniazek@miradores.com

text:
The problem is not with the function - I replaced it and the bug persists.

I will take a deeper look in the problem (and remove the deprecated methods anyway).
creator: nagoya@felipeal.net
nagoya@felipeal.net
text:
Hi again,

Sorry, you're right, the problem was with the StringUtils.chomp() call.

I changed it and it works fine now.

I'm closing this bug and will open a generic one about all deprecated methods
that should be replaced.
